name: jet-set
description: A tiny, simple, powerful, dynamic library for setting, getting, and watching application state.

scripts.build: npm run makelib && cp ./src/jetSet.js ./lib/jetSet.js && npm run uglify
scripts.lint: npm run lint:src && npm run lint:tests
scripts.qa: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.watch:src: chokidar './src/jetSet.js' -c 'npm run lint:src && npm run test && npm run build'
scripts.watch:tests: chokidar './tests/**/*.js' -c 'npm run lint:tests && npm run test'

author: Phillip Luther
